[set page_title]About Barry's Books[/set] __LOGOBAR__ __MENUBAR__ __NO_LEFT__ Barry's Books, Bikes, and Birkenstocks is your source for all the most important things you buy everyday. We have the internet's most unique return policy. Since this is a totally fake store, you can't buy anything here. So if you place an order you won't get anything. Return any item you don't receive for a full refund. We'll never take any of your money anyway, but if we did, we'd give it right back.
